project.name: |-- 011-reducing-and-summarizing
project.description:
Keywords: + Streams + Collectors + counting, maxBy, minBy, summingInt, averagingInt, summarizingInt, joining
This project includes very simple examples that illustrate how to perform different operations with streams.
SummarizingAndReducingRunner: Illustrates the use of several predefined collectors to do summarizing and reduction of streams: + Collectors.counting() + Collectors.maxBy() and Collectors.minBy() + Collectors.summingInt() + Collectors.averagingInt() + Collectors.summarizingInt() to obtain general stats on numeric streams + Collectors.joining()
ToListUsingReduceRunner: Illustrates how to implement imperatively the Collectors.toList method. This is done as an example and should not be used in production code.
